name: peerplays-electron-build-bookie
description: The intent of this project is to wrap bookie in electron.

scripts.copy:contents: npm run make-build && cp -R contents/build/* build/
scripts.copy:app: npm run make-build && cp app/electron.js build/
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run copy:contents && npm run copy:app
scripts.release: npm version patch && npm run compile && npm run dist
